articles.title: FDA Refuses to File Moderna’s mRNA Influenza Vaccine (mRNA-1010)
articles.summary: CBER Director Vinay Prasad overruled career FDA reviewers to reject Moderna’s mRNA flu vaccine application. Sector-wide implications for mRNA platform valuation and CBER regulatory risk across vaccines, gene therapies, and cell therapies.
articles.label: Flash Note
articles.author: Satya Bio Research
